459730.name: A World With No Colour
459730.description:
Arriving on a world void of colour, your job is to bring colour to all things with your mighty colour canon.

A fairground, an iceberg covered with penguins, the deep sea and more. Find the colours hidden around the world and colour to your heart's content. Make everything blue, make everything red, its up to you. Or just make it all white again.

Made by PoissonRouge Interactica game studios. Known around the World as creators of quality interactive content for small people.

Recommended age - 7 and up.
459730.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
